  • B.Sc. in Aeronautical Engineering
  • Level-6 Bachelor in Aeronautical Engineering
  • HND in Aeronautical Engineering
  • ND in Aeronautical Engineering
  • OJT: EASA part 145 MRO

[/vc_column_text][vc_zigzag][vc_single_image image=”293″ img_size=”medium” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded”][vc_custom_heading text=”Department of Business Administration” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:22|text_align:center” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_column_text]

  • BBA in Aviation Management
  • HND in Business

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/12″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/12″][vc_single_image image=”312″ img_size=”medium” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded”][vc_custom_heading text=”Department of Computer Science & Engineering” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:22|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_column_text]

  • Diploma in Web Development

  • EASA part-66,(HND+EASA)
  • Pilot Training,(PPL,CPL & IR) Type
  • Training:
  • Boeing-737
  • Airbus-A320
  • ATR 42/72 etc

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
